original_text:
The mercenaries in her ranks
    are like fattened calves.
They too will turn and flee together,
    they will not stand their ground,
for the day of disaster is coming upon them,
    the time for them to be punished.
korean_text: 또 그 중의 고용꾼은 살진 수송아지 같아서 돌이켜 함께 도망하고 서지 못하였나니 재난의 날이 이르렀고 벌 받는 때가 왔음이라

sentences.original_text: They too will turn and flee together,
they will not stand their ground,
for the day of disaster is coming upon them,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 재앙의 날이 그들에게 임하고 있기 때문이며,

sentences.original_text: the time for them to be punished.
